title: Ideas anyone??
content: I have a school assigment to create a logo for a printing company called "STRONG IMAGE" I really would like to go with type only, and avoid an image, but I keep using a fist or a lion to symbolize strength. Anyone have ideas. If anyone should have websites that can help, I would be grateful.
author: anonymous

comments.content: Linda, I'd investigate 3D letters, maybe with perspective and a cast shadow. As if the words made a building. I'd also stay sans serif and all caps. Thats where I'd start, Dan
Linda you might investigate a 3D look. Solid like a building and maybe cast shadow. I'd also tend towards a sans serif face and probably all caps. At least thats where I'd start. Dan
